data.actual_result: Chat jumps to the New Message Separator, which does not disappear after several minutes of activity.
data.expected_result: After a user stays in a channel for a couple of minutes the New Messages separator disappears and does not jump to the place it was, leaving at the spot where user was at the time or screen rotation.
data.short_description: New Messages separator does not remove after couple of minutes of activity in the channel, which moves the chat to the separator when changing screen orientation.
data.steps_to_repro: - Warning: this is an actual bug, it is not intended behaviour, confirmed by Dabbit. Do not deny this bug because of NAB. - Go to the channel with new messages - Scroll up to the point where New Messages separator appears. - Scroll down/up, hiding New Messages separator from the viewport (screen). - Turn the scrern orientation. - Observe.
